short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension resolves issues with Zoom Contact Center in multi-tab scenarios due to the browserâ€™s third-party storage policy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Zoom Contact Center for CRM browser extension allows for communication between the Zoom Contact Center CTI embedded in a CRM and its WebRTC communication window that is opened. This allows for a better multi-tab experience within the browser for CRM windows.
